name: Chroma [Charge]
description:
Chroma is based on a play-by-post RP idea I had years and years ago, that I've spent the intervening time trying to find some satisfying way to run. Since there was a game jam going on for the Charge SRD (a system I had already been wanting to play with), I decided this was the perfect chance to finally put all my ideas to paper.

It's very much an ode to the magical girl and sentai shows of my youth, namely Sailor Moon and Saint Seiya. If you enjoy getting to be a "fated magical hero" in a team with matching themes and beating up bad guys, I think you're going to like this one.

Charge has very simple and versatile mechanics, and I hope I've done them justice in this silly little project of mine.

◆ ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ ❴✪❵ ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ ◆

Files

I'm happy to announce that the fully fancified PDF version of the game is now available! So you now have THREE file options to suit your needs— a plaintext file that's friendly to screenreaders, a file straight from the word processor that's also plaintext but with some pretty colors, and the full-color, full-decor PDF.
